trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for 3-D models.
trans-unit.target: 提供 3-D 模型的功能。

trans-unit.source: Objects of this type include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 此類型的物件包括<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> class to render <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D>類別來呈現<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can compose <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup> to form a single model.
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>物件使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>來形成單一的模型。

trans-unit.source: You can share <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects among <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> objects to make multiple instances in a scene.
trans-unit.target: 您可以共用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D>物件之間<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D>場景中進行多個執行個體的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" />，它會指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" /> 與軸對齊的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> bounding box for the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> 周框方塊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" />, and makes deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" /> 的可修改複製品，並製作這個物件之值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (雖然可能已不再解析)，但不會複製動畫或其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" /> object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，並製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied; however, their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，用於使用針對 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 實作而定義的預設格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值的提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，用於取得作業系統目前地區設定中的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式，格式化目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 採用指定格式之目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the Model3D.
trans-unit.target: 建立 Model3D 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the Model3D.
trans-unit.target: 建立 Model3D 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性 (Culture) 特有的格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the Model3D.
trans-unit.target: 建立 Model3D 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the Model3D.
trans-unit.target: Model3D 的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> set on the model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在模型上設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" /> set on the model.
trans-unit.target: 在模型上設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D.Transform" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D.Transform" /> 相依性屬性。
